description: The copyright text is missing from  openstack/common/__init__.py  in oslo-incubator and there is a missing line between the import and the following code line too.
title: Missing copyright text in oslo-incubator in  openstack/common/__init__.py

comments.content: The copyright text is missing from  openstack/common/__init__.py  in oslo-incubator and there is a missing line between the import and the following code line too.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ildiko-vancsa

comments.content: By policy files without code should not include a copyright header. I know this file has code, but only two lines. Also, not a nova bug, we'll pickup whatever oslo does on next import.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mikal

comments.content: The patch is up for review for oslo-incubator: https://review.openstack.org/#/c/79273/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ildiko-vancsa

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/79273
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/oslo-incubator/commit/?id=d166e488c2af2a03aa36a9cbf61f08f06c8a4489
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit d166e488c2af2a03aa36a9cbf61f08f06c8a4489
Author: Ildiko Vancsa <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Mar 7 16:13:02 2014 +0100

    Add copyright text to openstack/common/__init__.py
    
    The copyright text was remove from the file and as it now contains
    code, it is missing. This patch readds the copyright text and also
    fixes formatting, as adds empty lines between the import and the first
    line of code.
    
    Closes-bug: #1288877
    
    Change-Id: I37013194cc808d919ff2345099cd1d053ffe7d88
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master

commit b1c0ec117febbbff6a94bf96122d00bdeeec40f8

    Add copyright text to glance/openstack/common/__init__.py
    
    Synchronize the content of glance/openstack/common/__init__.py to the
    one in oslo-incubator.
    
    Change-Id: Idd059e3f4d00d91c9a14cf302fd780044929e3e5
